name: TUA-159
description: Verify that a user can add location to the list of locations after filling in only mandatory fields with valid data
descriptionHtml: Verify that a user can add location to the list of locations after filling in only mandatory fields with valid data

testStage.description: Verify that a user can add location to the list of locations after filling in only mandatory fields with valid data

steps.name: Authorize user with valid email admin@gmail.com and password admin
Click on dropdown for authorized user in top right corner of header
Click on 'Мій профіль' button in dropdown for authorized users
Enter data into the 'Назва' field of 'Додати локацію' pop-up
Choose a 'Київ' city from the 'Місто' drop-down list
Enter data Сумська 2/3 into the 'Адреса' field
Enter data 50.00100346155677, 36.234188917163884 into the 'Географічні координати' field
Enter data 0977777777 into the 'Номер телефону' field
Check if checkbox with name 'ТестЛокація2' is displayed
